If not, see 22 <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>. */ 23 24 /* 25 * ISO C Standard: 7.16 Boolean type and values <stdbool.h> 26 */ 27 28 #ifndef _STDBOOL_H 29 #define _STDBOOL_H 30 31 #ifndef __cplusplus 32 33 #define bool _Bool 34 #if defined __STDC_VERSION__ && __STDC_VERSION__ > 201710L 35 #define true ((_Bool)+1u) 36 #define false ((_Bool)+0u) 37 #else 38 #define true 1 39 #define false 0 40 #endif 41 42 #else /* __cplusplus */ 43 44 /* Supporting _Bool in C++ is a GCC extension. */ 45 #define _Bool bool 46 47 #endif /* __cplusplus */ 48 49 /* Signal that all the definitions are present. */ 50 #define __bool_true_false_are_defined 1 51 52 #endif /* stdbool.h */
